definitions.definition: An illustration or artwork done with the use of paint .
examples: The Mona Lisa is one of the most famous paintings .

definitions.definition: The action of applying paint to a surface.
examples: The outside of the old house would benefit from some painting .

definitions.definition: The same activity as an art form .
examples: Some artists, like Michelangelo, excel in both painting and sculpture.

main_definition: ( countable ) An illustration or artwork done with the use of paint .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The action of applying paint to a surface.
( uncountable ) The same activity as an art form .
